resources.string: Rules of the Game: there will be three figures in front of you, one on top and two on the bottom, two of them will contain numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the two lower figures be equal to the number in the upper figure, for this you need to insert the missing number.

Example: There is a number 7 in the upper circle, and a question mark in one of the lower ones, and the number 4 in the other. So the number 3 should be in place of the question mark, because 3 รท 4 = 7
